website_summaries.verdict: This is the classic Victorinox watch, with signature white dial encircled in red enamel. Swiss quartz movement. Analog design, and a casual, informal feel with the nylon band.
pros: Affordable and reliable, the classic Victorinox red and black minimalist design features a nylon band that can be changed out for different outfits if desired
Water-resistant to 300 feet (100 meters), and a 2-year warranty if purchased via Amazon
Includes a date feature, and large numbers make it easy to read
cons: Select buyers report the included band wears quickly, and select models have slowed in timekeeping or completely quit working only a few months after ownership

customer_reviews.title: What a great historic timepiece
customer_reviews.text: What a great historic timepiece! I own the original 1989 model but haven’t been wearing it due to its smaller size. Wearing this watch definitely takes me back. This is a no nonsense watch. All the functions work as they are intentended to. The lume is bright. The strap could use a little upgrading because the one that comes with it is very thin. With that being said, I absolutely love this watch and highly recommend it. I’m attaching a photo of this watch next to the original 1989 model.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin O.

customer_reviews.title: Water resistant to what?
customer_reviews.text: This watch is a disappointment.. Got it wet the first day and it immediately fogged up and stayed fogged up. Not water proof, not water resistant. This one, at least is not water anything.
customer_reviews.author: Richard McE

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect except it loses time and only had it 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: The watch was a gift for my husband. It is perfect except it loses time and only had it 6 months. Thought maybe battery? Took to jeweler who said battery was strong. Return is only 30 days. Would love to exchange for new one if I could reach seller.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela H Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Classic simplicity
customer_reviews.text: Clean and classic looking watch which appears flawless. I've owned several watches through the years and this is just a no frills stunner of a watch. I may replace the strap at some point but it works just fine as is. It's so lightweight it almost disappears on your wrist. If your the outdoors type of guy who appreciates a good watch and doesn't need it to connect to bluetooth or count your steps this is your watch. As to it's waterproof ability I have had it in some trout streams and it's been fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jon M

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch! They Last Forever!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly the product that I wanted. My father in law had a swiss army watch exactly like this that he's had for many many years. Amazon was the only place that I could find the same thing. These watches last forever. The band is of good strong quality. The face itself is heavy and of good quality as well. This is a great simple watch for the working man and it goes with anything you want to wear, dress up or dress down.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Jewel

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS.
customer_reviews.text: Fogged up and stopped working. This is not even water resistant. It's smaller than I expected and I ended up just throwing it away after wearing it for 2 DAYS!!! I checked the back plate and it was loose. Thats probably how moisture got in. Shouldnt have been this way!!!!! SAVE YOUR MONEY. DO NOT GET THIS WATCH. ITS A MAJOR RIP OFF!!!!
customer_reviews.author: catherinemarie

customer_reviews.title: Problem with Manual Date Adjustment
customer_reviews.text: I would like to update this purchase to 4 stars since the replacement I ordered arrived impeccable in all aspects. Item arrived defective. There is an obstruction/interference which can be felt and heard at certain dates when manually adjusting the date over its 31 day range. I have no idea if this will eventually totally break but don't want to take a chance. No other watch I have or have had does this. Also, if there is supposed to be a manual in the box it was missing. I'm returning the watch for a refund. 2 stars because otherwise it would have been a great watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected...
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing like the simple, timeless design of a classic. I just strapped it on, right out of the box, and expect years of faithful service. For the guy who just wants to know what time it is. I must agree, however; the band is not quite what I expected. I had one years ago, and I'm sure the band was more substantial. I'll give it a chance, but I see an upgrade coming.
customer_reviews.author: JOE WIKERT

customer_reviews.title: The Red Circle has Csptured Me!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome watch. I’m glad I went w the smaller version because I have tiny wrists! The strap is a little long for me...but I’m Mr Tiny Wrists so there ya go. Not a big deal. I have lots of straps. I like the simplicity of the dial and the pop of the red circle/ bezel is visually striking. The hands do have decent lume. This is the kind of watch that I could wear for a long time: affordable, durable, light, and good looking.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal !
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this watch (original version) - since this watch first came out in 1989, which I wore for several years. That watch never gave me a moment's problem. It was light weight, and very accurate. I have been going to replace it just seemed never to get around to it. Until now, I saw this watch on a warehouse deal and decided to do it. What a very nice watch. This watch was new and in excellent condition. If this watch turns out half as good as my old watch I will be very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer # 1Top Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Stopped keeping accurate time after one month
customer_reviews.text: Began losing time after one month. Because I now have to reset the time multiple times a day, it has become unusable. Sadly, it is beyond the return date. Definitely not worth the money and a NO BUY recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Tall man

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with Swiss Army Watch
customer_reviews.text: My second Swiss Army watch. The first lasted better than twelve years in daily use. Cannot ask for more from a $100 watch (at the time), so ordering this one wasn't a difficult decision. My old one still runs, but the date wheel corroded as a result of an improper seal when the battery was replaced. When the new one arrived, it was losing about 8 minutes a week. Amazon replaced it in two days without question or hesitation. And the new one has two year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Islander

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Defective. Slows down and stops randomly, even after a battery change. Unacceptable for a $140.00 watch. My $25.00 plastic Timex is more reliable than this watch. Sad. The return window has closed, and I'm stuck with dealing with a warranty repair. Not impressed, Victorinox.
customer_reviews.author: Raphael P. Web

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: A few days ago, I had written a 5 star review concerning this watch. Since that time, this watch started losing time to the tune of about one hour per every 24 hours. Then I noticed that the date indicator was not working correctly. It is my belief that there was something mechanically wrong with this watch. Because of all this nonsense, I asked for a refund, I sent the watch back and now I am giving this watch one star. I cannot recommend a product like this.
customer_reviews.author: JimTop Contributor: Bass Guitars & Gear

customer_reviews.title: a little disapointed
customer_reviews.text: The watch is perfect in size , it dont look like you have an alarm clock strapped to your wrist 43mm is perfect. the down site is the construction of the watch body is plastic and putting on a better watch band will cause stress on the Pin Pockets causing it to disconnect the band from the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Don K. Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Durable
customer_reviews.text: My first Victorinox lasted 19 years, so after a brief fling with some other watches I purchased this one. Slim, lightweight and with the comfortable and cool nylon band it is I hope a worthy successor to the first one. We will see how long it lasts. Of note is the band. Too many watches have plastic bands these days, In my experience these crack and are hot. The woven nylon is a better solution.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie D

customer_reviews.title: These Waches are not as good as they once were
customer_reviews.text: It loses 5 minute a month, it is no good so disappointed. I have had one for 22 years that I love, it is still running, keeping perfect time. that is why I bought a new one. please take it back. How would I have known during the return windopw?
customer_reviews.author: hllywd

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch --- replaced a "Same Brand" watch that had ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch --- replaced a "Same Brand" watch that had worn out after many years. ---new one keeps great time ---the one drawback is the strap, it's too big and I'll need to replace it ---not a serious problem just an annoyance. The strap that came with it would be comfortable on a 300 lb gorilla ! Often wonder what these people are thinking when they do this kind of stuff !
customer_reviews.author: Roy F. Bonner

customer_reviews.title: Good watch , not rugged ,
customer_reviews.text: Mixed feelings about this watch, had to return it the first week , it stopped running. I dropped it from 2 feet onto a wooden floor, not a huge shock I thought. I’ve also had to replace the pins twice. They popped out while I was carrying a box. The holes on the watch don’t seem to be deep enough. Still like the watch but it is far from the old rugged Swiss Army watch.
customer_reviews.author: oxford102

customer_reviews.title: These watches still offer nice style and great value
customer_reviews.text: I've had 3 or 4 of these Swiss Army watches over the years, nicely detailed, well finished, tough, long lasting and great value. My most recent daily beater watch was a Luminox which I loved, but it broke and didn't make sense to repair. I want to buy another one and was shocked at how much they'd gone up; but not the 'Victorinox pieces all of which have been updated stylewise and still affordable. Have a box full of big name more expsnive stuff, but I'll proudly wear this every day.
customer_reviews.author: Call me Carlo

customer_reviews.title: Cool watch, sub-standard craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: I liked this timepiece for its subdued look and 24-hour time capabilities. It served me well for about 7 months and then the piece that connects the wristband strap to the watch case broke. I was able to put it back together, but only a couple of weeks later, the piece broke again and the watch fell off when I didn't realize it. Not exactly the quality I'd expect from Victorinox especially considering the market they sell to.
customer_reviews.author: George Bevan

customer_reviews.title: Minimalist Awsomeness!!
customer_reviews.text: Been a big fan of the Swiss Army brand for years, I wanted an on subdued watch I could wear on my trips to Central and South America, saw this one and immediately liked the 43mm, it's understated simplicity it's what drew me to this piece, simple, elegant and backed by its legendary reputation. The watch it self weighs next to nothing very comfortable, very comfortable you forget you have it on, the lume is adecuate and the price was right in my opinion. If you are looking for that classic and a bit of a nostalgic look this is the one for you, I recommend 100%
customer_reviews.author: Jose E. Machado

customer_reviews.title: Simple and well build
customer_reviews.text: Owned the original for 20 years. This watch seems as well built with better access to the battery compartment. My old one could not be repaired by the current jewelry shops. I like the design for its simplicity and compact size. I really did not want to bolt a small computer to my wrist. Could use dial illumination to make it the perfect simple watch
customer_reviews.author: joe figueira

customer_reviews.title: Strap pins very weak. Bought 2 and both fall off
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch but this is my 2nd one and the watch keeps breaking off ! Pin straps are NOT staying in place. Called customer support and they advised to take to jeweler. ?? $105.00 and I have to take to a jeweler ?? Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Bianchi

customer_reviews.title: A fine watch at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I've owned these watches in the pasts so it was really no surprise. I did replace the band with a nice metallic band similar to a Rolex. This is a nice size, easy to read and the hands and hour markers glow at night which is nice. You can spend a lot more money (I have!) and not own a nicer watch. They are tough and dependable-just like the Swiss!
customer_reviews.author: Warren W. Wiley

customer_reviews.title: It looks so great on his wrist
customer_reviews.text: My husband had a Swiss army Cavalry watch. I did too but mine finally quit after 25 years. He gave me his and he got the new one. It looks so great on his wrist. I personally wouldn't want it. It looks quite manly. On him, though, we both like it better than the previous watch. It is really a fantastic looking watch.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but opened back cap.
customer_reviews.text: back case came opened.note that you need to tight your watch back cap case or it will be no more water and moisture resistant. Look like Victorinox genuine one but i cant understand its opened case issue
customer_reviews.author: slava i.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work. Received a Dud.
customer_reviews.text: Watch came - I was very excited to get it - but it was non-functioning. Checked stem - set time / reset time / maybe a dozen times - could not get the second hand to move. Possible battery issue - possible faulty manufacturing - unknown. Tried going through customer service. Unable to get anything resolved. Will look into returning watch.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Great watch and great value.
customer_reviews.text: My hubby always liked Swiss Army Victorinox watches. He was very specific as to what he wanted. He just wanted the date not the day. He wanted the hands to glow in the dark too. It came with a cloth watchband, which he didn't want, so I bought a leather watchband and it looks fantastic. It was easy to install and now he's happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Does not come as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I would say that on pictures looks more tough. The case is from some alloy looks almost like plastic and wristband is really thin and cheap. All in all for 105$ you can find much better quality Citizen or Seiko. I am sorry to say this but it’s true. Really not satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dario M.

customer_reviews.title: Crappy parts
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months of use the strap keeps popping off on one side. It’s only a matter of time before it falls off and I don’t notice and lose it. Very annoying. Yes I can go to a watch place and get a new part but that is time wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Peeps

customer_reviews.title: Battery Dead on Arrival + one day
customer_reviews.text: I received the watch and it looked just like the picture on Amazon. I wore the watch one day it was great, day two it was dead. Since I live overseas instead of returning it I took it to a local jeweler and they replaced the battery for 12 dollars...I expected more but maybe it has been on a shelf running for years. Will make me think twice about the next one. UPDATE : Not even a message saying sorry we sent a crappy battery!
customer_reviews.author: OR

customer_reviews.title: Lugs are 18.5mm apart, not 17mm as stated.
customer_reviews.text: The stock band is too long and very cheap feeling. I replaced it with an 18mm nylon NATO band, which works ok. The lug width on this watch is 18.5mm, not 17mm as stated in the description. Any generic 18mm band would work.
customer_reviews.author: sempervirens

customer_reviews.title: Nylon case inferior
customer_reviews.text: A great watch put in an inferior nylon case. The band when stressed, instead of the pin breaking or the band tearing, the retaining holes for the pins rip out. Which makes it impossible to be worn. Now I have an affordable watch that is useless.
customer_reviews.author: dearth

customer_reviews.title: Every Day Use Watch for Anyone
customer_reviews.text: I’m always looking for a good every day use watch to have from running errands or going to work and this watch does the trick. It’s easy to read and I can’t complain about the accuracy whatsoever. I will say the band might not be to everyone’s liking but if you work in a hot environment it’ll work better than genuine leather and of course you can change it out for a personal preference band. All in all I would recommend for style and general usefulness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Accurate / Perfect Size / Great Style
customer_reviews.text: This is a great watch!! I looks good, it’s the perfect size and it is very accurate. I don’t have big wrists and this watch still looks good. I was kind of worried because it looked really good on my brother who has big wrists and I thought it might not look so good on me, but I was wrong. I highly recommend this time piece.
customer_reviews.author: ClearyPD

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t buy this watch
customer_reviews.text: It worked great with the original battery but once the battery was changed the time was lagging behind by 5 minutes. I’m disappointed because I really like Victorinox watches but I can’t wear a watch that needs to be adjusted every day. Other reviewers have reported the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: John K.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE.  VERY CHEAP PIECE OF JUNK.
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. Got it a little wet and it fogged up and stopped working. Not happy at all with this.
customer_reviews.author: catherinemarie

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch Swiss Army WristWatch
customer_reviews.text: Large Face, easy to read, extremely good quality, and very fashionable! I'm thru with "Asian" made watches. I've had them all; LaSalle, Casio,Seiko, etc. etc., and none compare to a Swiss Made Watch! IMHO
customer_reviews.author: 2150bye

customer_reviews.title: Does the watch fit your life style
customer_reviews.text: It is a fit to my style of living. Not fancy but practical, accurate, and easy to read. The band is great for for the warm weather no concern as with a leather band. Accuracy appears to be spot on but that is going to depend on how accurate your action is in setting it. It is a very nice watch for little cost. If it performs as well as my other Victorinox watch I will be very pleased indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L Gilley

customer_reviews.title: Great watch.
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch; classic styling, accurate, comfortable & a good size. I did put a metal bracelet on (do not like straps or clasps). This takes the place of my Marlboro Swiss Army which lasted over 20 years until a jeweler broke it replacing the battery! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: L. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I've had these watches for 30 plus years and always feel I get my money out of them. They usually work for about 4 or so years (one or two battery replacements) before they die for good. Can't find any plain, rugged watches, these are the best I've found.
customer_reviews.author: Tom C.

customer_reviews.title: inexpensive, durable, easy to read
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of smart watches breaking and I could care less about counting steps or any of the other nonsense. I need a tough watch that is readable at a glance. I don't need a status symbol super expensive Rolex, ( I have one and it is only a watch) Nor do i need a gadget like a smart watch.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice basic watch that's easy to read, it's lightweight and comfortable. The hands and little dots by the numbers glow in the dark. I've only had the watch about a week so I don't know about it's accuracy yet. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: rick

customer_reviews.title: A Classic!
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar watch as a kid except the bezel was black. Really nice and simple watch that covers the basics: time and day of the month. It is lightweight and comfortable. Perfect for everyday wear. Note: it will not go through a metal detector.
customer_reviews.author: R Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Very good casual watch that is attractive and functional
customer_reviews.text: My second purchase of this watch. A very good casual watch that is attractive and functional with an easy to read dial---perfect for weekend wear. The watch band is not particularly durable but ok at this price point--would be nice if the band was a little thicker / more durable but for a watch made overseas (China, I suspect) it's an above average timepiece.
customer_reviews.author: TarHeel

customer_reviews.title: Highly-legible
customer_reviews.text: The large, high-contrast dial with sharply-legible numerals and relatively-wide hands make this watch easily readable at a glance, even from a wide angle. The black synthetic case and band are a nice change from my previous, all-metal watch.
customer_reviews.author: KHoward

customer_reviews.title: "looks even better than the picture"
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a teenage "young man". He really liked it and said it looked even better than the picture. Ultimately it's a pretty standard analog watch. Not a lot of bells and whistles. Just gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Pin Fails, Watch Lost
customer_reviews.text: I loved the watch. Unfortunately, the pin that holds the band to the watch kept giving out. The watch was lost after a month.
customer_reviews.author: MJS

customer_reviews.title: My experience with this watch is LOW QUALITY.  It eats batteries and keeps time poorly
customer_reviews.text: Multiple battery replacements by different jewelers. Each one said they had issues with properly replacing the battery. Over the past 90 days I have replaced the batteries three times...at $20 a pop!!!....only to find it dead within a few weeks. I have used Victorinix products in the past very successfully...but I think they terminated their quality control department recently. Friends of mine have had similar experiences. I will never buy their watches again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not covered under warranty
customer_reviews.text: My watch stopped working in less then 9 months, l sent it in according to the warranty instructions (it has a 3 year warranty) I was told that it’s not covered under the warranty because I purchased it from Amazon. Very Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This watch is the easy smart looking watch to have on my wrist
customer_reviews.text: This watch is the easy smart looking watch to have on my wrist. These watches from Victorinox are most lasting watch to own for keep time and surviving rough workout. This my second watch from Victorinox which still running keep time, have for more than 10 years. Wear it for only outdoor work.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wesche

customer_reviews.title: Watch band broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: The watch band broke after a few months of normal use. Would this brand make a weak watch band? What gives?
customer_reviews.author: B. T. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Good quality/easy to adjust the time & date
customer_reviews.text: The bold face reads well: the bans is very comfortable. The large stem makes adjusting the time & date very easy. The luminous hands are not very bright in a dark setting: I shined a bright light on it for several minutes and that helped but it dimmed rather quickly.
customer_reviews.author: New Rotick

customer_reviews.title: Dead After 2 Months
customer_reviews.text: This watch stopped working after 2 months so I spent $30 on a new battery. Still not working. I need Amazon to do the correct thing and give me a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher H Pokorny

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch!
customer_reviews.text: I live this watch! I've been wearing it for three years, and it has held up terrifically. I replaced the original watch band with a NATO strap; I like the utility of them. I would recommend this watch to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: ClanMcCandless

customer_reviews.title: Love my new watch.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch used. The description read re- packaged. I bought the watch knowing the watch itself would be in excellent condition, but assumed it would be packaged in a generic box. No. If it was repackaged, it was done so in an original box, with warranty card. The only thing missing was the manual, which I already knew from the description. I don't think this watch had run until I pushed in the dial. By all rights, this watch was brand new. Very happy with my order.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent watch, and Victorinox is a nice brand I like. My 3 star review of this watch is in no way a bad mark on their product reputation, but performs on the exact same benchmark as a $30 watch that can be bought elsewhere. People can talk economics and ethical/proper sourcing of materials and labor all they want, but for nearly $100 (at time of reviewing) this watch is wildly overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Died in 2 years and 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this watch in October of 2016, and it died (I assumed the battery was just dead) took it to a jeweler to have battery replaced, and they tell me it is dead, not just the battery. 2 years and 3 months, and I paid 145 bucks at the time for this hunk of feces. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: T. OLeary

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointment
customer_reviews.text: Dissaponting. After one week is incapable of keeping track. Don’t buy it. I live in Chile, so I'll try to get it fixed down here, but any cost would be absurd.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Karich

customer_reviews.title: nice classic watch
customer_reviews.text: I've had this watch for a few days now- accuracy of time is within 1/2 second per day. It hasn't gotten wet yet, but it will. Nice looking watch, seems to be solid and of good quality. I'm a firefighter/EMS and like having a minute hand on an analog watch. It has a big enough face that it's easy to read under less than ideal conditions. The 2 things that I would do to improve this watch would be a screw down crown and tritium illumination. Great watch for the price, however.
customer_reviews.author: V Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Still one of my favorite watches
customer_reviews.text: I own several Rolex watches, but I still love this little watch. I must admit that it is one of my favorites. I recently bought this one after I damaged the previous one that I had owned for more than 30 years.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Bush

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: I have slim wrists and this watch is perfect. I don't even notice I'm wearing it. It's very light. I'm not a fan of the strap but that can always be replaced. Strap is light but just feels a bit flimsy. It's a perfect EDC watch.
customer_reviews.author: Claudio Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and accurate.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something more casual for a change from the normal dress watch and my customary dive watch. This fit the bill at 39mm, and the nylon and leather band. May become my go to weekend watch. It is also accurate - hasn't gained or lost a single second after 6 days of continuous wear. If your arm is less thsn 7 inches around I recommend you stay with thr smaller size watch
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: easy to read
customer_reviews.text: This watch is accurate, very light on the wrist, easy to read, even at a distance. I recommend the white face with the contrasting black numbers.The red ring on the watch helps getting the eye to quickly focus.The strap is comfortable to wear in both hot and cold weather. The numbers for the calendar date are not as bold as I would like, and the minute and hour hands could be brighter to help reading it in low light or at night. The dial case size is just right, not to big to get bound up in a long-sleeved shirt. .
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Watch was a hit.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to replace one he had from years ago. It was a hit. My husband liked it better than his old one. This one was a bit larger. Great watch, hope it lasts another 30 years.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Ciociola

customer_reviews.title: A classic
customer_reviews.text: It’s Swiss Army...that says quality And dependability. It’s light, easy to read the time and will last and last! Good looking too.
customer_reviews.author: Mort65

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This watch is exactly what I wanted. Victorinox quality, smaller profile 39mm case and lightweight. I can't even tell I have it on compared to my heavier stainless steel watches. I was looking for a basic field style watch and this is it. It's stylish and would look great in any setting. If I lose it or destroy it, I'll get another. The knife package sold for $4 more than the watch alone. A no brainer in my opinion. The knife is a perfect keychain edc item.
customer_reviews.author: tmump

customer_reviews.title: Rugged and outdoorsy looking watch for rugged and outdoorsy people.
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch since it goes well with my Swiss Army knives of which I am a big fan of. This is my second one since on the first one, the part of the casing that holds the pin that connects the strap to the body, ripped out of its socket and eventually ruined the socket. However, this was from carrying arm loads of fire wood with the arm that my watch was on. This put undo strain on the strap and thus the pins and socket. Carry wood with your other arm.
customer_reviews.author: Tore B. Heskestad

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to read. A simple tough watch (so far) Looks good. The watch has a certain class to it. It's not a BIG watch. it is not overbearing it is subtle but not small.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch. Well priced
customer_reviews.text: I bought thus watch for my sons 18th birthday. He is extremely happy with it. It comfortable and look nice and keeps accurate time and date and the price was very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking. Looks & feels like a $30.00 watch.
customer_reviews.text: This little watch is a disappointment, and not what I’ve always expected from Victorinox. It comes with a flimsy little band trimmed in cheap, fake leather.
customer_reviews.author: Samual Spade

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fits my needs perfectly. We swim and boat a great deal and I wanted a watch that would meet my needs by being rigged and water resistant. This one does it all.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Watch stops working at random times for 20 minutes or so.
customer_reviews.text: Same problem other people have had: the watch stops working for about 20 minutes every so often. Changing batteries doesn't solve the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch Not Belt Buckle Sized
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful dial, mineral crystal and nice size. A quality watch and a reasonable price. From five to one. Stopped keeping time after one year. Appears to be a grey market watch. Does not appear to have warranty support. I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: J. E. Adams

customer_reviews.title: The watch came with a dead battery. I have ...
customer_reviews.text: The watch came with a dead battery. I have owned this same watch that lasted for 15 years. Died after a roadside bomb shook it apart. This particular watch had just been on the shelf too long with out the stem being pulled out. UPDATE: I returned this item as it was defective and as a result, I was charged a $30 restocking fee.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Good Watch, Pathetic Band
customer_reviews.text: Watch is fine and would cost about $200 at a watch and jewelry store. The band is pathetic. Returned to the store where I was usually able to get decent rubber bands in the past, but they have not yet found one the right size. I'm currently using another band I used previously on a watch that has died.
customer_reviews.author: LR2

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: I haven't worn a watch in decades but decided to get one. This looks nice, keeps time and I get comments about it's nice looks.
customer_reviews.author: RopeMan

customer_reviews.title: This watch is very trustworthy even for years...
customer_reviews.text: This is thee only version of watch my husband will wear. He has only bought a few over the many years because they are so dependable. His only disappointment is that it is rare to find the band replacement as shown. Vinyl or metal choices do not work with his skin. He wears this as a banker, with his tux, and while fishing, hunting, gardening. It is thee go-to watch for everything. Too bad Rolex.
customer_reviews.author: BonnieBee

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: Great watch, looks very good, keeps excellent time. Only negative is the "date" is hard to read. I recommend this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read. Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The watch is easy to read, light weight and comfortable. The band is a bit flimsy. It came on time and the packing was fine.
customer_reviews.author: peter cape cod

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch.
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one of these I have purchased during the last 25 or 30 years. I am hard on outdoor watches but I like this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P

customer_reviews.title: Watch stopped working 3 months after purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Watch stopped working 3 months after I bought it. Took it to a Swiss army authorized store, told me it’s not worth repairing.
customer_reviews.author: Rani

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and slim. Light weight.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice. Is a smaller watch. The red bezel really pops. Is attractive. Very light weight. Slim profile is great for wearing under sleeves. Seems to hold time well...even though I just set it yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: Jevans

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Swiss Made product. The size and weight are better than expected. The watch looks very attractive in pictures, but in person is a real nice piece. The watch band is a little larger for my wrist, but the quality an appearance are stunning. I'm very proud about my new watch.
customer_reviews.author: Fabio Zamudio

customer_reviews.title: Great quality watch
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good quality watch to wear around the house, work in yard, exercise, go to beach, swim. This watch is perfect! Looks great for an everyday watch. Runs quiet and good size. I have a small wrist but fits great. Waterproof and glows in dark. The casing is charcoal not black which is much better!
customer_reviews.author: Juliene McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bright, clearly visible dial, lightweight, attractive...But just a week old and too soon to comment on reliability.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but not consistently accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and easy to read in daylight, but not good in low light. Accuracy is a problem. About once a week, the time is off by hours.
customer_reviews.author: ricks716

customer_reviews.title: Welcome Back
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. I'd had this watch for years and was expecting it to stop functioning, and am glad the original is back on the market. There are some slight design changes, for the better, I think. The band seems a bit more sturdy than it was in the past, but time will tell. I went with the smaller size, which turned out to be what I'd had all along.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan G. Lamm

customer_reviews.title: Reliable watch, can be dressed up or down
customer_reviews.text: I had a Victorinox Swiss Army watch for years, and I lost in in a river. So good to have it back; rugged watch, easy to read in low light. The old watch was white faced, this one is black and I like it very much
customer_reviews.author: Willdbeast

customer_reviews.title: Ho-hum overall.  More of a $40 watch
customer_reviews.text: It’s meh. I wouldn’t buy it twice for the money. It’s a quartz movement, fairly cheap feel, and flimsy feeling band. Not crap, but I think it’s fair to say the pics are more enticing than the actual watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Casual  classic Swiss watch
customer_reviews.text: Great casual watch with Swiss logo. Black face and comfortable black wrist band. Classic easy to read numerals. Quiet sweep. Product as described. Well pckgd and quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Jim C

customer_reviews.title: Actually give it a 4 out of 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Having a little issue with the watch band. Says 20 mm but ordered a 20 mm band and the pins are to short.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W. Begley

customer_reviews.title: Received as promised.
customer_reviews.text: Returned to Victorinox Men's 249087 Original XL Black Stainless Steel Watch same day for refund.
customer_reviews.author: T.E. Highfield

customer_reviews.title: Good deal of reduced price
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I bought the reduced price watch and its working fine. No noticeable damage or scratches to face or body. Time will tell, ha ha!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Great classic watch, especially for smaller wrists
customer_reviews.text: This is a great watch. Simple design but classic. For a guy I have a smaller wrist and the size of the case is great. The case is more gray in color than it appears in the product photo but it still looks very nice. The band was a bit disappointing though. Very thin material, flat buckle and a pointed end. Fortunately, I had a Hadley Roma band of the same basic design, but much better materials, on an old watch that I switched over.
customer_reviews.author: David K. Williams

customer_reviews.title: reliable Swiss army watches over the years and just love them. Their simplicity
customer_reviews.text: I have had a number of these old standard, reliable Swiss army watches over the years and just love them. Their simplicity, fit, reliability and durability have been excellent. highly recommend them for an inexpensive, reliable and yet attractive watch for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Swiss Quality Timepiece
customer_reviews.text: I thought the watch face would be larger and I'm unable to see the time in the dark; however, the time piece is accurate, it looks great and, at first, I thought the band was too small. After a few days the band loosened up and fits great. I would recommend this Swiss made watch to anyone needing a watch and not just a gaudy ornament for the wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch, hope it lasts like my last one
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, but I've only had it a couple weeks. If it lasts like my last one (25 years and it only stopped working because I dropped it and bent the minute had so it wouldn't pass a certain point on the face) I'll be very happy. Looks about the same and was the $16 less than the one I bought in '92.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B

customer_reviews.title: Only watch husband will wear.
customer_reviews.text: The only watch my husband will wear! He was given his first about 15 to 18 yrs ago. He works outdoors slot and this watch lasts through everything he puts it through. The only negative is the cost of replacement watch bands. If you buy the mfgrs, be prepared to pay.
customer_reviews.author: PJM
